main event: On February 27, 1967, a retired Admiral sighted what he initially thought was a military plane or helicopter that quickly accelerated and left the area.
interesting points: The witness described the object as the size of a bus or a large truck., The object had a smooth, metallic appearance and was either elliptical or cigar-shaped., There were no wings, propellers, or visible engines on the object., The witness was riding a bus when he observed the object descending., The object was estimated to be moving at a speed of approximately 5 miles per second.
sighted object: An elongated, curved UFO with no visible wings or engines
